17.post_text: 4 sweet messages to choose from, 4 perfect ways to share the love.

comments.message: Haahaa! now everyone know them... Irene and Joseph.

Hey Lorraine Despi-Orquiza, Pauline Mah and Josephine Ong,

We're sorry if you ladies didn't receive your red packets. Kindly visit the store you patronized and purchased your Chinese New Year merchandise from and speak with the store manager about receiving your entitled packets.

Apologies for any inconvenience caused.

Hey Ashley Ng Yoke Leng, Amelia Tan, Karen Tan, Stella Ng,

Apologies for this. Do email us at customer@starbucks.com.sg . Our team will look into a convenient arrangement to assist you with the red packets. 

Do allow them up to 3 working days to get back to your email. :)
